# 图片与动画

## 代码

+ 原地跑

  ```html
  <canvas class="c1" width="400" height="400"></canvas>

  <script>
    const base64 = 'data:image/png;base64,' ;
  </script>
  <script>
    /** @type {HTMLCanvasElement} */
    const canvas1 = document.querySelector(".c1");

    /** @type {CanvasRenderingContext2D} */
    const ctx = canvas1.getContext("2d");

    const img = new Image();
    img.src = base64;
    // img.src = "./lf.jpg"

    img.onload = () => {
      let i = 0;
      let time = 0;
      const show = () => {
        clearInterval(time);
        ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas1.width, canvas1.height);
        ctx.drawImage(img,94*i,0, 100,img.height, 0, 0, 100,img.height);
        i++;
        if (i === 5) {
          i = 0;
        }

        time = setInterval(show, 100);
      }
      show()
    }
  </script>
  ```

+ 向前跑

  ```html
  <canvas class="c1" width="400" height="400"></canvas>

  <script>
    /** @type {HTMLCanvasElement} */
    const canvas1 = document.querySelector(".c1");

    /** @type {CanvasRenderingContext2D} */
    const ctx = canvas1.getContext("2d");

    const img = new Image();
    img.src = base64;
    // img.src = "./lf.jpg"

    img.onload = () => {
      let i = 0;
      let j = 0;
      let time = 0;
      const show = () => {
        clearInterval(time);
        ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas1.width, canvas1.height);
        ctx.drawImage(img,94*i,0, 100,img.height, j*5, 0, 100,img.height);
        i++;
        j++;
        if (i === 5) {
          i = 0;
        }
        console.log(j);

        if(j >= 70){
          j = 0;
        }

        time = setTimeout(show, 50);
      }
      show()
    }
  </script>
  ```
